anotherPlayerBlocked: You can't do this because {{username}} currently has a pending action ({{reasons}})!

blockedContext.acceptItem: choice to keep an item or not
blockedContext.cartSmallEvent: choice to get in the cart or not
blockedContext.cooldown: You are typing commands too fast!
blockedContext.drink: choice of whether to drink a potion
blockedContext.fightPetChoose: choice of an action for the pet fight event

interactionNotForYou: This interaction is not intended for you!
playerBlocked: You can't do this because you currently have a pending action ({{reasons}})!
playerDoesntExist: The requested player was not found!
guildAlreadyExist: The name you chose is already used by another guild.
guildNameNotValid:
The rules to naming a guild are as follows:
$t(error:stringRules)
alreadyInAGuild: You already belong to a guild.
pleaseWaitForHeal:
Please wait for the healing end of your state to continue playing: {{time}}

:information_source: You can use the {command:shop} command to purchase care.
pleaseWaitForHisHeal: Please wait until the end of healing of its state alteration: {{time}}
notEnoughMoney: You don't have enough money to perform this action. You are missing {{money}}{emote:unitValues.money}.
cooldownPetFree: You can only release one pet per hour. You will be able to release another one {{remainingTime}}.
petNickNotValid:
The rules for naming a pet are as follows:
$t(error:stringRules)
stringRules:
- Use at least one letter
- Do not put more than 2 consecutive spaces
- Special characters are not allowed
- Between {{min}} and {{max}} characters
notInAGuild: You have to be in a guild to use this command.
notAuthorizedError: You do not have the required permissions to do that command in your guild, please ask a superior if needed.
levelTooLow: You must **Level {{level}}** to use this command! Come back later!
targetLevelTooLow: This player must be **level {{level}}** for you to use this command!
notAuthorizedRight: You do not have permission to perform this command.
notPossibleWithoutStatus: You don't need our services right now

notStartedHint.self: Use the {command:report} command to start your adventure!

deadHint.self: You can relive by using the {command:respawn} command to continue playing.

errorOccurred:
An error occurred while executing this command :(

Please report this issue to a team member, specifying the time and server on which you encountered this problem.

Please do not join our support server for help: https://discord.gg/5JqrMtZ
maintenance:
The game is currently under maintenance, please try again later.

For more information, go to the official Discord server: https://discord.gg/AP3Wmzb
